Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Southbound Reroute near Michigan/Randolph
ShortDescription: SB 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via Randolph, State, Washington and Michigan, due to street blockage near Michigan/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via Randolph, State, Washington and Michigan, due to street blockage near Michigan/Randolph.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line No Trains Between Roosevelt and 63rd
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 63rd due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Roosevelt and 63rd due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Howard and Roosevelt, and,
  • between 63rd and 95th, only.

Shuttle buses are available between Roosevelt and 63rd to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as the #29 State bus, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
